title: ISketchSpline.ModifyControlPoint
description: Specifies new coordinates for the specified control point of this sketch spline.
signature:
System.Boolean ModifyControlPoint( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 1-based index of the control point to modify

returns: True if control point successfully modified, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISplineParamData::GetControlPoints
and
ISplineParamData::ControlPointsCount
to help specify Index and the new coordinates.
After calling this method, you must call
IModelDoc2::ForceRebuild3
to update the sketch.
